Date: Monday, 6/2/1978
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Bill Campbell



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1978
Subject: Progress of Nate Snell
Dear Sir,
Nate Snell has nothing more to prove at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
He has an ERA of 3.24 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/7/1978
Subject: Progress of Sergio Ferrer
Dear Sir,
Sergio Ferrer has nothing more to prove at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an AVG of .279 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
